channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-11922] Misspelling of threshold in log4j.properties for tests in hadoop-tools
item.description:
log4j.properties file for test contains misspelling "log4j.threshhold".
We should use "log4j.threshold" correctly.
item.summary: Misspelling of threshold in log4j.properties for tests in hadoop-tools

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

gliptak, you can give patch for hadoop-aws and hadoop-azure projects..

This message was automatically generated.
As hadoop-nfs was fixed by HADOOP-10387, we need only hadoop-azure and hadoop-aws. Combined these two patches and attaching it.

Jenkins passed this test. It was unable to put comment back to Jira.

https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/6529/console

Committing soon

Committed to trunk and branch-2.
Thanks gliptak, brahmareddy and ajisakaa
